title: IGP102
treatment_protocol_ch1: During radical prostatectomy, tissue samples from the peripheral zone of the prostate were taken with a 6 mm punch biopsy instrument immediately after surgical removal of the prostate from tumerous and non-tumerous areas . The punches were immersed in RNAlater (Qiagen) for 24h at room temperature and subsequently stored at -80C. To confirm the presence of tumor, all punches were sectioned, and tumor cell content was determined in every 10th section. Only sections containing at least 70% tumor cells were included in the study. Normal prostate tissue samples were obtained from  patients who underwent radical prostatectomy for prostate cancer. Also these punches were sectioned and inspected for presence of normal prostatic epithelial cells in every 10th section. Only sections containing between 20-40% normal prostatic epithelial cells were included in the study.
extract_protocol_ch1: AllPrep DNA/RNA Mini kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturerÆs instructions. Briefly, tissue sections were homogenized in 1 ml RLT Plus buffer using TissueLyser (Qiagen). After DNA separation, 1.5 volumes of 100% ethanol were added to the total RNA and the mixture was purified. The quantity and quality of the total RNA was checked using the Nanodrop and Bioanalyzer.
label_protocol_ch1: Affymetrix WT Sense Target Labeling Assay, follwed by manufacturer's instructions (using 1ug of total RNA)
hyb_protocol: Affymetrix WT Sense Target Labeling Assay, hybridization done following manufacturer's instructions
scan_protocol: Arrays were scanned using the Affymetrix Gene Chip scanner 3000 7G system.
description: Large-scale gene expression profiles were investigated in 48 normal and 47 prostate tumor tissue samples using Affymetrix GeneChip Exon 1.0 ST microarrays. Gene expression profiles were compared among TMPRSS2-ERG fusion-positive and negative prostate tumors as well as benign samples.
data_processing: Gene expression profiles were obtained by applying the Robust Multichip Average (RMA) implementation included in the Affymetrix Power Tools (APT). APT creates expression values for 17881 transcript clusters as defined in the meta-probe set files provided by Affymetrix.
contact_institute: German Cancer Research Center and National Center of Tumor Diseases

label_protocol_ch1: Affymetrix WT Sense Target Labeling Assay, follwed by manufacturer's instructions (using 1ug of total RNA)
hyb_protocol: Affymetrix WT Sense Target Labeling Assay, hybridization done following manufacturer's instructions
scan_protocol: Arrays were scanned using the Affymetrix Gene Chip scanner 3000 7G system.
description: Large-scale gene expression profiles were investigated in 48 normal and 47 prostate tumor tissue samples using Affymetrix GeneChip Exon 1.0 ST microarrays. Gene expression profiles were compared among TMPRSS2-ERG fusion-positive and negative prostate tumors as well as benign samples.
data_processing: Gene expression profiles were obtained by applying the Robust Multichip Average (RMA) implementation included in the Affymetrix Power Tools (APT). APT creates expression values for 17881 transcript clusters as defined in the meta-probe set files provided by Affymetrix.
contact_institute: German Cancer Research Center and National Center of Tumor Diseases
